hymn.title: The Lord is my greatest love
hymn.category: The Church—As Our Home and Rest

lyrics.stanza: The church is my home sweet home, She fills all my longing, The Lord's beloved bride is she, All my days for her shall be. O home full of love and care! God's river of life we share; I'm strengthened every day, And guided all the way; Dear Church! How I love Thee, Home sweet home, I love Thee!
